description.value:
The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, or [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Hold Breath. The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Skewer. Once per turn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra [[/damage 3d6 average=true]] damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
